summary:
There are two Gung Fu suits, one Worn and torn from battle and strife, and a non-worn, fresher suit.
there is an awesome set of classic Gung Fu shoes also. There is also a set of Katars or fist blades
and all these items can be made at a forge.
descriptionHtml:
Edhildils Gung Fu Gear BBP
Author: Edhildil
09,18,2013
ver1


NOT Really LORE FRIENDLY.


Please read the whole description before you comment.


[img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/1236/descriptionn.png[/img]

For female only.

I made this mod after trying \\\"Grandmaster - True Unarmed and Unarmored Combat\\\" by leecarter

You can find it here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13281

This mod is intended to be used with \\\"Grandmaster - True Unarmed and Unarmored Combat\\\", in which
your character gets bonuses/perks while unarmored and unarmed. it\\\'s an awesome mod if you\\\'re a martial arts fan.
I wanted something that looked cool and had no armor rating but still had the Gung Fu feel.

There are two Gung Fu suits, one Worn and torn from battle and strife, and a non-worn, fresher suit.
there is an awesome set of classic Gung Fu shoes also. There is also a set of Katars or fist blades
and all these items can be made at a forge. (Leather)

The suits are weighted for BBP. 

NOTE: The fist blades DO NO DAMAGE. Why? Because the Grandmaster mod is an UNARMED perk mod, and if they
DID damage you would NOT receive the perks provided in the Grandmaster mod. I hope I made that clear enough.
 
If some wants to use my mesh and make a set of Katars that do damage go ahead just give me credit.

I made one custom body size, that\\\'s my story and i\\\'m sticking to it. If you want another size or weight sliders
I don\\\'t have time for that, but if someone wants to make that, just give me credit. It would be nice if it was 
dependant on this mod also so that my original work wasn\\\'t lost in the dust of time, which is understandable.
Exceptions would be large mods like a huge store or dungeon/quest that included these clothes, but credits still apply. 
(That means I don\\\'t want to be completely ripped off if someone just reposts ALL my content of this mod with some slight changes, that\\\'s not cool)


[img]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/4153/requir.png[/img]


Calientes CBBE body mod installed and running in your game.(hand textures?) Or compatible textures.

[img]http://img163.imageshack.us/img163/6344/suggesth.png[/img]


\\\"Grandmaster - True Unarmed and Unarmored Combat\\\" by leecarter

You can find it here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13281

 
 
[img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/2482/installa.png[/img]


Unzip Data file to a temporary location 
Check folder paths and make adjustments if needed
copy/paste into Skyrim folder.



[img]http://img443.imageshack.us/img443/9233/uninstall.png[/img]

delete data/meshes/armor/edhildil/gungfu folder
delete data/textures/armor/edhildil/gungfu folder
delete EDhildilsGungFuGear esp. file in your Skyrim Data folder.

[img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/8579/creditslo.png[/img]

Caliente for CBBE
Cherryhotaling for BBP
Edhildil (these new meshes and textures)

A big thanks to leecarter for the Grandmaster mod which inspired this mod.


Tools used:
=======
Blender
Nifscope
Gimp 2

Thanks to all above and to Skyrim Nexus.

[img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/4562/usaget.png[/img]

If you want to use my meshes/textures in your mod please give the proper credits listed in your mod readme/description. It would also be nice if you sent me a link so I can check out your mod.   Enjoy!
author: Edhildil
